snippet.title: Halfbrick Rocket Racing Trailer
snippet.description:
The first trailer for Halfbrick Rocket Racing, the third game to be released under the Halfbrick Fridays series of casual games. Coming soon to Xbox Live Indie Games, HRR features a unique control system where two analogue triggers are used to power rockets on the left and right side of each craft. Alternate power to each rocket witht he triggers to achieve pinpoint cornering - and you are away!

It's high speed, easy to play and incredibly fun racing coming soon to Xbox Live Indie Games!

Click to Subscribe: http://bit.ly/HalfbrickYTSubscribe

Follow us on Social Media: 
Twitter: @Halfbrick
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/halfbrick/
